Jewelry Repair Enterprises Inc DBA Fast Fix Jewelry and Watch Repairs

Established in 1984, Fast-Fix Jewelry and Watch Repairs® is the world’s largest and most trusted consumer choice for jewelry, watch, eyeglass frame, and smartphone repair services as well as custom jewelry design and personalized engraving services. Fast-Fix has over 155 locations in the United States, and Ireland. Fast-Fix will be entering the Canadian market in 2017.  Fast-Fix has opened stores inside Meijer's Department Stores as well as Walmart stores.  Each store is staffed with some of the industry's best jewelers, watchmakers, watch repair professionals and smartphone technicians who provide superior quality services.

summary: FRANCHISING, OPERATIONS, AND DEVELOPMENT EXECUTIVE - EXPERIENCE WITH START-UP, TURNAROUND AND DAY-TO-DAY OPERATION OF FAST GROWTH COMPANIES“Specializing in optimization of financial and operational performance through people and systems”Solution-focused and profit-driven leader with the vision, experience and business acumen to analyze the current business models, lead the development of a strategic plan, and implement the plan with the assistance of both the Field Support Services group and field management. Skilled negotiator who consistently builds positive, mutually respectful relationships with internal and external resources to facilitate execution of agreed upon objectives.Hands on experience in multifaceted leadership positions to earn progressive responsibility for operations, business development, information technology, real estate/construction, marketing/advertising, loss prevention/internal audit, purchasing, budgeting, and franchising. Skilled at managing cross-functional teams and implementing workflow processes that improve productivity.Reputation as a “troubleshooter” supported by over 30 years of successful management level experience with companies ranging from entrepreneurial ventures to multi-national corporations. Valuable network of business contacts throughout the US, Canada, Europe, and Asia.Specialties: operations, business development, information technology, real estate/construction, marketing/advertising, loss prevention/internal audit, purchasing, budgeting, and franchising
